description: It's a wild world out there friends, and we highly recommend you immerse yourself in it. But if a weekend around the campfire isn't in the cards right now, at least the Wild Camp T-Shirt for men is the next best thing. This slim fit graphic tee is planet-friendly (and people-friendly too, thanks to being made in a Fair Trade Certified™ Factory), and the graphics are a playful nod to the wild and wonderful world that's waiting for us outside. In fact, they might just persuade you to pack up the car for the weekend...
name: Prana Wild Camp T-Shirt, Slim - Mens
